abstract: Verizon said it would make its mobile network available for a text-message program by Naral Pro-Choice America.
snippet: Verizon said it would make its mobile network available for a text-message program by Naral Pro-Choice America.
lead_paragraph: Reversing course, Verizon Wireless announced yesterday that it would allow an abortion rights group to send text messages to its supporters on Verizon’s mobile network.

headline.main: Verizon Reverses Itself on Abortion Messages
headline.print_headline: In Reversal, Verizon Says It Will Allow Group’s Texts
